page.title: 18RECREATION/GARDENING/GAMES.
page.content: {Gardening}is a hobby enjoyed by many residents of Headcorn and although this area East of the village is more sparsely populated, the gardens are well cared for, resulting in colourful displays of{Flower-beds,Rockeries}and} neat{Lawns.}The clay soil here is rather heavy,so it is advisable to use additives like Peat, Phosphates or Compost.This enables gardeners to grow most kinds of plants successfully - {Vegetables, Flowers, Fruit}and{Shrubs. INDOOR GAMES and other pursuits are held in Headcorn Village, where there is a wide choice of activities for all to choose from -{Badminton, Dancing, {Women's Institute}and many more. There is one{Public House}called the "Black Horse"situated on the bend of the main A274 road when entering the Village from the South, where a game of{Darts}and a drink may be enjoyed.
